ComicInfo.Summary:
It all comes to a head for G.I. Joe! Can Roadblock and his team escape the underground in time? And is Scarlett prepared for all hell to break loose?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Aaron Conley (a) & Jean-Francois Beaulieu (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Giannis Milonogiannis | 2 | C | Cover C | Bart Sears (a) & David Garcia Cruz (c) | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Dylan Burnett | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-10 12:25:34. [CVDB628338]
ComicInfo.Colorist: David Garcia Cruz, Jean-Francois Beaulieu, Lovern Kindzierski
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Aaron Conley, Bart Sears, David Garcia Cruz, Dylan Burnett, Giannis Milonogiannis, Jean-Francois Beaulieu
ComicInfo.Characters: Baroness, Burn-Out, Buzzer, Cobra Commander, Crystal Ball, Destro, Doc, Dr. Mindbender, Flint, Quick-Kick, Road Pig, Roadblock, Rock & Roll, Salvo, Scarlett, Skywarp, Torch, Zandar, Zarana
